content:
THE ROOMS AND SUITES AT THE PADRE HOTEL OFFER FRESH DESIGN SCHEMES, HIGH-END AMENITIES, AND LUXE FURNISHINGS CREATING THE PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN STYLE AND SUBSTANCE.
Choose between four room types:  40 Winks, Double Deuce, Maverick, and Corner Pocket Rooms. Plus three distinctive suite categories: Head Honcho, the Farmerâ€™s Daughter, and the Oil Baron Suites.
